snippet: "Family Tree," created by Christopher Guest and Jim Piddock, will star Chris O'Dowd as a 30-year-old man on a journey of personal discovery.
abstract: "Family Tree," created by Christopher Guest and Jim Piddock, will star Chris O'Dowd as a 30-year-old man on a journey of personal discovery.

headline.main: HBO Orders Comedy Series 'Family Tree' From Christopher Guest
headline.print_headline: A Return to TV For Christopher Guest
